title: Bliss Sampler: 2014
description: This free Bliss Sampler contains excerpts from every Bliss author since the launch of the line, as well as sneak peeks of our March titles that you won't find anywhere else! Plus never before seen deleted scenes from some of your favorite books. With over twenty wonderful Bliss samples just a click away, there's something for everyone.Paula Altenburg     Cindi MadsenRachel Astor         Tracy MarchClaire Baxter         Theresa MeyersRobin Bielman       Jenna RutlandSara Daniel           Annie SeatonBarbara DeLeo     Jennifer ShirkAubrie Dionne       Roxanne SnopekKaren Erickson     Natale StenzelRachel Harris        Farrah TaylorColeen Kwan        Kelley VitolloOphelia London    Vicki WilkersonIncluding a sneak peek at our March books...Susan Meier          Sonya Weiss
author: Various
